title: Any suggestions how to fill out a form ccp section 700.160(b)(2) spousal affidavidt so I can lien my debtors wifes account
question: Looking for a form or template to fill out this form to send to the bank of my debtors wife.
answers: Visit your local public law library and ask for The Rutter Group's "Enforcing Judgments and Debts" practice guide and its companion Forms book. Look for "spousal affidavit" in Chapter 6.
You need to hire a local lawyer experienced with these issues to assist you.
answer_card_text:
